name: Drunk Santa
description:
DOWNLOAD EXECUTABLE (BOTTOM) FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE

Drunk Santa

Do you believe in Santa? He does exist! But there is an issue… He is a little bit different than you would expect…. Take over his character and help him deliver Christmas gifts! Remember though - true Santa likes to treat himself to a good drink.

Instructions

As a Santa, you want to deliver as many gifts as possible, but after every delivery, you like to please yourself with a sip of good booze. Deliver as many gifts you can and try not to crash your sleigh. Press Up (or W) and Down (or S) to control Santa.

Credits

The game with Unity Engine by Ursi Games. Arts by Magdalena Stelmach (@moono) Programming by Paweł Stelmach (@dangerrad) and Piotr Światkowski (PanMadzior).

Warning! This video game contains flashing lights which may not be suitable for photosensitive epilepsy.
